meanings.definition: To see or experience (an event or situation)
meanings.sent1: I witnessed a beautiful sunset yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She witnessed the magic show at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The cat witnessed the dog trying to dance.
meanings.sent4: The old tree witnessed generations come and go.
meanings.sent5: The child witnessed the butterfly emerge from its cocoon.

meanings.definition: To testify to the occurrence of (an event)
meanings.sent1: The witness witnessed the car accident in court.
meanings.sent2: He witnessed the crime and reported it to the police.
meanings.sent3: The parrot witnessed the sneaky squirrel stealing nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her tears witnessed the depth of her sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins witnessed the rise and fall of civilizations.
